name: Avoid PLI Programs with more then XX Procedures (PL1)
description: This rule searches for PL1 Main Procedures (Programs) that have more than XX procedures and functions. XX Parameter can be set at will. The default parameter value is 50.
output:
The report lists all the for PL1 Main Procedures having more than XX procedures.

It provides following information: 
- for PL1 Main Procedures full name
rationale: Having artifacts with more then XX Procedures makes them more difficult to maintain.
remediation: Review the source code in order that the PLI programs not have more than XX procedures.
alternativeName: Avoid PLI Programs with more then XX Procedures (PL1)
